4. Mayors of Haslet

Mayors of Haslet
================

In chronological order from most recent to past, the Mayors of Haslet include:

* (2021 - Present) Gary Hulsey
* (2009 - 2021) Bob Golden
* (2005 - 2009) Gary Hulsey
* (2002 - 2005) Francis S. Leong
* (1999 - 2002) Gary Hulsey
* (1993 - 1999) I.J. "Blackie" Frazier
* (1992 - 1993) Bob Street
* (1983 - 1992) O.M. "Odie" Cowart
* (1980 - 1983) J.T. Ringo
* (1977 - 1980) Wayne Knox
* (1975 - 1977) W.D. Cooper
* (1973 - 1975) Wayne Knox
* (1965 - 1973) J.T. Ringo
* (1961 - 1965) Will Shaw

### Contact Us

   101 Main Street  
   Haslet, TX 76052

   Monday thru Friday
